ygData.subject: RE: Rebreathers...
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe so, but they re magical...  Most of the other things that we make don t weigh as much as the combined weight of their components..  making them weigh 10
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe so, but they're magical... Most of the other
things that we make don't weigh as much as the
combined weight of their components.. making them
weigh 10 automatically rules out an entire class of
people who would even consider buying them (monks).
It's bad enough that they added that magician stone to
the game.

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro
Master Tinker

--- "Wallace, Steven" <s.wallace@...> wrote:
> I doubt they will reduce the wieght. Have you ever
> tried scuba diving the
> equipment is heavy and bulky out of water and even
> more so with Rebreather
> equipment.
>
> Mithadris Midas
>
